<view class="page">
  <van-cell-group>
    <van-field label="商品价格" data-name="price"  value="{{shop.price}}" placeholder="请输入价格" bind:change="onChange"></van-field>
  </van-cell-group>

  <van-action-sheet
      show="{{ showAction }}"
      actions="{{ action }}"
      bind:close="onCloseAction"
      bind:select="onSelectAction"
    />
</view>

<view class="m-msg">
  <scroll-view scroll-y bindscrolltolower="queryList" refresher-enabled="{{true}}" refresher-triggered="{{triggered}}" bindrefresherrefresh="initList" class="m-msg-wrapper">
    <view wx:for="{{list}}">
      
    </view>
  </scroll-view>
  <no-data customStyle="padding-top: 400rpx;" text="聊天列表空空如也~" wx:if="{{!loading && list.length === 0}}"></no-data>
</view>

[{"label":"js","name":"js","code":"onConfirm() {
    this.selectComponent('#item').toggle();
  },
  onSwitch1Change({ detail }) {
    this.setData({ switch1: detail });
  },
  onSwitch2Change({ detail }) {
    this.setData({ switch2: detail });
  },"},{"label":"wxml","name":"wxml","code":"<van-dropdown-menu>
  <van-dropdown-item value="{{ value1 }}" options="{{ option1 }}" />
  <van-dropdown-item id="item" title="{{ itemTitle }}">
    <van-cell title="{{ switchTitle1 }}">
      <van-switch
        slot="right-icon"
        size="24px"
        style="height: 26px"
        checked="{{ switch1 }}"
        active-color="#ee0a24"
        bind:change="onSwitch1Change"
      />
    </van-cell>
    <van-cell title="{{ switchTitle2 }}">
      <van-switch
        slot="right-icon"
        size="24px"
        style="height: 26px"
        checked="{{ switch2 }}"
        active-color="#ee0a24"
        bind:change="onSwitch2Change"
      />
    </van-cell>
    <view style="padding: 5px 16px;">
      <van-button type="danger" block round bind:click="onConfirm">
        确认
      </van-button>
    </view>
  </van-dropdown-item>
</van-dropdown-menu>"},{"label":"wxss","name":"wxss","code":""},{"label":"json","name":"json","code":""},{"label":"data","name":"data","code":"    switchTitle1: '包邮',
